title: Yorktown Battlefield Part of Colonial National Historical Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Road Resurfacing Expected to Cause Tour Road Closures Throughout the Summer.  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Road Resurfacing Expected to Cause Tour Road Closures Throughout the Summer.  Be aware that throughout the summer of  2016 road resurfacing is to take place at both Yorktown Battlefield and Historic Jametowne causing temporary closures and areas of loose gravel.
